item.title: Schrodinger's Delivery Service
item.description: Made for Champlain Montreal Game Jam 2024

item.title: About Me
item.description:
I’m Max!

I’m a game designer with a focus in Systems. I love making making new interactions for players to test out and making it feel good to play in the process!

Experience

While at Champlain College, I’ve spent multiple semester making projects with teams of various sizes to make fun and unique games. These include FincrementalOS, a incremental fishing game, Cthulhu and Me, a pseudo-roguelike third-person shooter.
